results.content: a very good intro into FontAwesome. wish more was shown, like a tutorial on all sections on Docs features. But well done good job. Showing how to insert an icon and different groups of icons wasn't that helpful as students are not learning anything new.
results.content_html: a very good intro into FontAwesome. wish more was shown, like a tutorial on all sections on Docs features. But well done good job. Showing how to insert an icon and different groups of icons wasn't that helpful as students are not learning anything new.

results.content:
Cant find the purpose of having separate videos for downloading and installing Sublime and Firefox since they can be mentioned just like requirements (or prerequisite for this course since you have free courses for them).
MAMP is lacking some better explanation what it is why its useful and what are the benefits of using it over some other products.
Going back to FONT AWESOME which this course is all about I would say. Well explained almost everything about it, I would give more effort on developing more videos when you are actually using it and giving some scenarios for other learners instead of the pointed negative things at the start of my review
